# Create azure function
- function in cloud/functions, own fil- function in cloud/functions, own file
- service in sebastian/usecases (own folder)
- if necessary: clients in sebastian/clients
- add logging (logging.info) for observability. not too verbose, but enough to trace the steps and intermediate results
- cloud/dependencies/services.py for helper for creating service
- if necessary: cloud/dependencies/clients.py for helper for creating client
- register azure function in function_app.py in root
